text: Prizzi's Honor is a 1985 American black comedy crime drama movie directed by John Huston and based on the 1982 novel of the same name by Richard Condon. It stars Jack Nicholson, Kathleen Turner, Anjelica Huston, Robert Loggia, William Hickey, CCH Pounder, Stanley Tucci, Lawrence Tierney and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was nominated for 7 Oscars, including Best Picture, Best Director and Best Actor with Huston winning for Best Supporting Actress in 1986. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1985 comedy-drama movies Category:1980s black comedy movies Category:1985 crime drama movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:1980s American crime drama movies Category:Movies directed by John Huston Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in New York City
title: Prizzi's Honor
